name: Taipei Medical University Academic Hub / Pure Experts
description: The site highlights the publications of TMU's researchers, and can be used to search for expertise, research units, research opportunities and collaborations. TMU consists of 11 research centers, a center for General Education, 11 colleges, and affiliated hospitals. The institution offers degrees and courses in medicine, oral medicine, pharmacy, nursing, public health, nutrition, medical science and technology, humanities and social sciences, biomedical engineering, and management.
